title: I still haven't been delivered the All-Star Show Bags from Hoyts Sylvia Park?
body:
It's been almost 2 weeks since i've been emailed regarding the delivery of the show bags to the homes of those who participated. My friends who have come along with me already received their show bags. I have put down the correct address. What seems to be the problem? 

Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey Panda Kai,

Let me follow up with Hoyts and see what we can find out.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=GbO39ExT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-24T02:50:27.497+0000)
>
> Hey Panda Kai,
> 
> Let me follow up with Hoyts and see what we can find out.

Are there any notice regards to the Show-Bag?
Responses are a bit slow over the xmas and new years period. Cool if I get back to you early to mid january?

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=GbO39ExT,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-12-28T11:05:23.055+0000)
>
> Responses are a bit slow over the xmas and new years period. Cool if I get back to you early to mid january?

That'll be okay. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

Thanks.

Hey Panda,

Are you able to email through your full name to  SylviaPark@hoyts.co.nz

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=GbO39ExT,comment-id=00000001000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-29T00:35:45.101+0000)
>
> Hey Panda,
> 
> Are you able to email through your full name to  SylviaPark@hoyts.co.nz

Hey MARAUDAUR, 

It seems like it is taking a very long time for Sylvia Park Hoyts to respond to my emails.
Hey are you able to email them again with your full delivery address, name and a picture of the ticket/receipt?

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=GbO39ExT,comment-id=0000000100000000000000010000,timestamp=2016-01-11T08:16:23.326+0000)
>
> Hey are you able to email them again with your full delivery address, name and a picture of the ticket/receipt?

Yes, I have emailed them.

Hey, sorry if I wasn't clear they have just asked me to ask you to email them again. Thats what my earlier message meant. If possible could you also forward to email to me as well - Maraudaur@riotgames.com

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=GbO39ExT,comment-id=000000010000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-12T01:39:33.881+0000)
>
> Hey, sorry if I wasn't clear they have just asked me to ask you to email them again. Thats what my earlier message meant. If possible could you also forward to email to me as well - Maraudaur@riotgames.com

The showbag has been delivered.

thank you for your help {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=GbO39ExT,comment-id=00000001000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-29T00:35:45.101+0000)
>
> Hey Panda,
> 
> Are you able to email through your full name to  SylviaPark@hoyts.co.nz

Hello,

I have emailed my full name to SylviaPark@hoyts.co.nz

Hey Panda Kai,

let me follow up with them, on this.

I've also emailed OCEEvents@riotgames.com regarding the proof of payment (as we were instructed to do) so we can receive the skins on our summoner accounts since the skins in the show bags were already expired.
